content.text:
# Guiseley and Rawdon (ward)

}}
| party1      = Labour
| councillor2 = Oliver Edwards
| party2      = Labour
| councillor3 = Eleanor Thomson
| party3      = Labour
| population     = 18,611
| population_ref = (2023 electorate)
| area_total_km2 =
| area_footnotes =
| hide_services = yes
}}
Guiseley and Rawdon is an electoral ward of Leeds City Council to the north west of Leeds, West Yorkshire, covering the town of Guiseley, the majority of the village of Rawdon, the southern part of the town of Yeadon, and the part of Menston within the City of Leeds.
Councillors
represented Aireborough ward (2003-2004) and Guiseley and Rawdon ward (2004-2010). Member of Parliament for Pudsey since 2010.]]
